authors.author: Fanny Jane Crosby Silas J. Vail

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Thou my everlasting portion, newline More than friend or life to me; newline All along my pilgrim journey, newline Savior, let me walk with Thee. newline Close to Thee, close to Thee, newline Close to Thee, close to Thee; newline All along my pilgrim journey, newline Savior, let me walk with Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Not for ease or worldly pleasure, newline Nor for fame my prayer shall be, newline Gladly will I toil and suffer, newline Only let me walk with Thee. newline Close to Thee, close to Thee, newline Close to Thee, close to Thee; newline Gladly will I toil and suffer, newline Only let me walk with Thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Lead me through the vale of shadows, newline Bear me over life's fitful sea; newline Then the gate of life eternal newline May I enter Lord with Thee. newline Close to Thee, close to Thee, newline Close to Thee, close to Thee; newline Then the gate of life eternal newline May I enter Lord with Thee.
